speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Paulo Casaca, on behalf of the Committee on Budgetary Control, on the recovery of Community funds ( 2005/2163(INI) ) ( A6-0303/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Paulo Casaca, on behalf of the Committee on Budgetary Control, on the recovery of Community funds ( 2005/2163(INI) ) ( A6-0303/2006 ).
